00001 <?php  if ( ! defined('BASEPATH')) exit('No direct script access allowed');
00002 /*
00003 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00004 | AUTO-LOADER
00005 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00006 | This file specifies which systems should be loaded by default.
00007 |
00008 | In order to keep the framework as light-weight as possible only the
00009 | absolute minimal resources are loaded by default. For example,
00010 | the database is not connected to automatically since no assumption
00011 | is made regarding whether you intend to use it.  This file lets
00012 | you globally define which systems you would like loaded with every
00013 | request.
00014 |
00015 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00016 | Instructions
00017 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 |
00019 | These are the things you can load automatically:
00020 |
00021 | 1. Packages
00022 | 2. Libraries
00023 | 3. Helper files
00024 | 4. Custom config files
00025 | 5. Language files
00026 | 6. Models
00027 |
00028 */
00029 
00030 /*
00031 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 |  Auto-load Packges
00033 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 | Prototype:
00035 |
00036 |  $autoload['packages'] = array(APPPATH.'third_party', '/usr/local/shared');
00037 |
00038 */
00039 
00040 $autoload['packages'] = array(APPPATH.'third_party');
00041 
00042 
00043 /*
00044 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 |  Auto-load Libraries
00046 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 | These are the classes located in the system/libraries folder
00048 | or in your application/libraries folder.
00049 |
00050 | Prototype:
00051 |
00052 |       $autoload['libraries'] = array('database', 'session', 'xmlrpc');
00053 */
00054 
00055 $autoload['libraries'] = array();
00056 
00057 
00058 /*
00059 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 |  Auto-load Helper Files
00061 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 | Prototype:
00063 |
00064 |       $autoload['helper'] = array('url', 'file');
00065 */
00066 
00067 $autoload['helper'] = array();
00068 
00069 
00070 /*
00071 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 |  Auto-load Config files
00073 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 | Prototype:
00075 |
00076 |       $autoload['config'] = array('config1', 'config2');
00077 |
00078 | NOTE: This item is intended for use ONLY if you have created custom
00079 | config files.  Otherwise, leave it blank.
00080 |
00081 */
00082 
00083 $autoload['config'] = array();
00084 
00085 
00086 /*
00087 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 |  Auto-load Language files
00089 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 | Prototype:
00091 |
00092 |       $autoload['language'] = array('lang1', 'lang2');
00093 |
00094 | NOTE: Do not include the "_lang" part of your file.  For example
00095 | "codeigniter_lang.php" would be referenced as array('codeigniter');
00096 |
00097 */
00098 
00099 $autoload['language'] = array();
00100 
00101 
00102 /*
00103 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 |  Auto-load Models
00105 | -------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 | Prototype:
00107 |
00108 |       $autoload['model'] = array('model1', 'model2');
00109 |
00110 */
00111 
00112 $autoload['model'] = array();
00113 
00114 
00115 /* End of file autoload.php */
